full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Request for Proposal (RFP)

The National Research Council Canada is seeking proposals from qualified contractors for the modernization of Lobby Elevator #1 and complete modernization of CPFC Elevator #4 at Building M-50.

### Tender Information

* Solicitation Number: 24-58048
* Tender Closing Date: July 16, 2024, 14:00
* Publication Date: May 29, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 23, 2024
* Contract End Date: March 13, 2025
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Scope of Work

The proposed scope of work includes:

* Partial modernization of Lobby Elevator #1
* Complete modernization of CPFC Elevator #4

### Mandatory Requirements

To be considered a responsive bidder, the contractor must meet the following mandatory requirements:

1. The contractor must have a minimum of ten (10) years' experience as an elevator contractor providing construction services comparable to this tender.
2. The contractor must supply a CV for the proposed Construction Site Supervisor and Project Manager.
3. The contractor must prove to be licensed to perform work in the province of Ontario.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The technical evaluation will consider:

1. Demonstrated experience by the contractor in providing general contracting construction services relevant to this project.
2. Qualifications and overall experience of the proposed Construction Site Supervisor and Project Manager.
3. Construction schedule for this project.

### Tender and Proposal Requirements

The contractor must submit one electronic Technical Proposal and one electronic Tender Form in two separate attachments.

* The Technical Proposal must be clearly marked “Technical Proposal” and focus on the technical aspects of the project.
* The Tender Form must be clearly marked “Tender Form” and contain all financial information.

### Security Requirements

* The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD).
* The contractor must provide a valid WSIB certificate with their Tender or prior to contract award.

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

Contact Information:
* Collin Long, Contracting Authority
* Email: Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 549-1549
